title: 12/02: Weekend Recap - What the Heck Happened!? (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
You've never heard Heath Cummings quite like this! Let's just say Week 13 didn't go so well for him, and he's not alone after Fantasy owners witnessed too many quiet performances from great players. Let's start with the big news (3:05) and move into our Winners (7:05) including Dalvin Cook and Jarvis Landry and Losers (10:50) including Larry Fitzgerald and Sony Michel ... A new segment called "Of Course He Did" (18:15) that deals with Chase Edmonds, Russell Wilson, Emmanuel Sanders and more. Plus the Dropometer (24:46), Legitometer (26:55) and Leaderboard (32:03) at each position. Great days for Josh Allen, Phillip Lindsay, Dante Pettis and Jared Cook among others ... Recapping each game with our Fantasy thoughts (42:36) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: It was an odd week in Fantasy Football and we're here to recap it and give you winners and losers from Fantasy Week 13.
